rules.name: Oath of Moment
rules.lore: In battle, Space Marines swear mighty oaths to ruin the enemies of the Imperium and uphold the honor of their Chapter. When the Space Marines strike, they do so with precision, reading the shifting battle with post-human speed and clarity, directing their wrath towards one priority target after another. Command assets, heavy artilery, and vaunted elites are laid waste with horrifying speed, until the Emperor's angels stand victorious over a field of smoulering ruin.

upgrades.name: Student of the Codex
upgrades.text: At the start of the battle, gain 1 CP.

upgrades.name: Sworn Fury
upgrades.text: Once during the battle, you may select two enemy units for Oath of Moment instead of one.

strategems.name: Armor of Contempt
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit has declared a Ranged or Melee attack
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has +1 to its Saving Rolls.
